statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_table;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_table WHERE quiz_type='Math';
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, quiz_type, assessment_date FROM feedback_table WHERE user_id=123;
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_table WHERE assessment_date='2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM feedback_table WHERE user_id=456 AND quiz_type='Science';
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, quiz_type, assessment_date, feedback_text FROM feedback_table WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_table WHERE quiz_type = 'Math' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, quiz_type, assessment_date FROM feedback_table WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_table WHERE user_id = 2 AND quiz_type = 'History' AND feedback_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY assessment_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM feedback_table GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_feedback >= 2 ORDER BY total_feedback DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM quiz_feedback;
SELECT quiz_id, student_id, feedback_text FROM quiz_feedback WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT assessment_id, feedback_rating FROM assessment_feedback ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) as feedback_count FROM quiz_feedback GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM quiz_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2023-01-01' AND feedback_date <= '2023-03-31';
SELECT * FROM quiz_feedback WHERE student_id = 100 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, student_id, feedback_rating FROM assessment_feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 4;
SELECT quiz_id, student_id, feedback_text FROM quiz_feedback WHERE student_id = 200 AND quiz_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(quiz_id) AS quiz_count FROM quiz_feedback GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM assessment_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC, student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_online;
SELECT id, user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback_in_person WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, quiz_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_online WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT id, user_id, recommended_quiz_id FROM learning_recommendations WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM feedback_in_person ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_online ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, quiz_id, rating FROM feedback_in_person WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback_online WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT id, user_id FROM learning_recommendations WHERE recommended_quiz_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_recommendations FROM learning_recommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_recommendations > 1;
SELECT * FROM online_quiz_feedback
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM assessment_feedback
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_profile
SELECT user_role, user_name, user_email FROM user_profile WHERE user_role = 'student'
SELECT recommendation_text FROM learning_recommendations
SELECT * FROM online_quiz_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_profile WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, quiz_id, feedback_text FROM online_quiz_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, assessment_id, feedback_text FROM assessment_feedback WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM learning_recommendations ORDER BY user_id, recommendation_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM online_quiz_feedback;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM online_quiz_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM learning_recommendations WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profile WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, assessment_score FROM in_person_assessment WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM online_quiz_feedback ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM online_quiz_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, assessment_score FROM in_person_assessment WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT recommendation_text FROM learning_recommendations ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 3;
